description: Variation of Condition 2  (The works hereby permitted shall be carried out in their entirety exactly and only in accordance with the submitted plan No(s) 100 - Window frame; 101 - Cornice; 102 - Skirting; 103 - Architrave; 104 - Window architrave; 105 - Flat roof section; 110 - Ground floor as consented; 111 - First floor as consented; 112 - Roof as Consented; 113 - Front elevation as consented; 114 - Side elevation as consented; 115 - Rear elevation as consented; 116 - Existing first floor roof structure; 117 - Proposed first floor roof structure; 210 - Proposed ground floor plan; 211 - GF Proposed RCP; 212 - Proposed first floor plan; 213 - FF Proposed RCP; 214 - Section AA; 310 - Proposed reception room elevation; 311 - Proposed rear reception room elevation; 312 - Proposed master bedroom elevation; 313 - Proposed bedroom 2 elevation; 314 - Proposed front and rear reception; 315 - Proposed Master Bedroom; 2700/9 Elm Place - Methodology for production of information in respect of works at Elm Place; Specification 1 - Material and workmanship: lathe and plaster; Specification 2 - Material and workmanship: lime on masonry; Specification 3 - Material and workmanship: reinstatement of brick wall; Specification 4 - Material and workmanship: floorboards., and other particulars, forming part of the Consent, and there shall be no variation therefrom without the written approval of the Local Planning Authority. (C205))of Listed Building consent LB/22/00959 to replace all existing internal doors with thicker 44mm thick, 4 panelled doors.
